sourcesContent:
import React from 'react'; import Axios from 'axios'; export default class Singal_post extends React.Component{ constructor(props){ super(props); this.state={ single:{}, allComments:[], comment:"", username:localStorage.username, like:0, allLikes:0 } console.log("props of singal_post ++++++++ ",this.props) } handleComment=(event)=>{ this.setState({comment:event.target.value}) } componentDidMount(){ Axios.post("http://localhost:9000/singlePost", {id:this.props.match.params.number}).then((response) =>{ console.log("data of single post +++++++++++++++",response.data[0]); this.setState({single:response.data[0]}); // this.setState({posts:response.data}); // console.log("posts areeeeeeeeeeeee########",this.state.posts); console.log("data in state is------->",this.state.single); Axios.post("http://localhost:9000/getComments",this.state).then((response)=>{ this.setState({allComments:response.data}); console.log("all comments are #######",this.state.allComments); Axios.post("http://localhost:9000/getlikes",{lk:this.state.like,file:this.state.single.file}).then((response)=>{ this.setState({allLikes:response.data.likes}) }) }) }) console.log("data in single is !!!!!!!!!!!!--->>>",this.state.single); } componentDidUpdate(){ console.log("in component did mount") console.log("data in single is !!!!!!!!!!!!",this.state.single); } submitComment=()=>{ console.log("file is ^^^^^^^^^^^^",this.state.single.file); console.log("username is ^^^^^^^^^^^^",this.state.username); console.log("comment is ^^^^^^^^^^^^",this.state.comment); Axios.post("http://localhost:9000/addComment",this.state).then((response)=>{ console.log("response &&&&&&&&&&",response.data); Axios.post("http://localhost:9000/getComments",this.state).then((response)=>{ this.setState({allComments:response.data}); console.log("all comments are #######",this.state.allComments); }) }) } handleLikes=()=>{ console.log("clicked on like button..............."); if(this.state.like === 0) { console.log("now likes are ^^^^^^",this.state.like) this.setState({like:1}) var l = 1; } else if(this.state.like === -1) { console.log("now likes are ^^^^^^",this.state.like) this.setState({like:1}) var l = 1; } else { console.log("now likes are ^^^^^^",this.state.like) this.setState({like:-1}) var l = -1 } console.log("now likes are ^^^^^^in function",this.state.like) Axios.post("http://localhost:9000/getlikes",{lk:this.state.like,file:this.state.single.file}).then((response)=>{ this.setState({allLikes:response.data.lk}) console.log("likes to frontend are",response.data.lk) }) } render(){ console.log("now likes are ^^^^^^in render ",this.state.like) return (
